channel.title: Javascript on trootski
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on trootski

item.title: Bond Project
item.description: While looking at various microservice patterns I found I wanted a playground for playing with components of a microservice based system in isolation. Coincidentally, in the halcyon days of winter 2019 I got an idea to binge all the James Bond films. Over the years I had seen them all. I generally watched them on television but never in any order and usually having missed the start. After having re-watched one of the movies I wrote down a very short hot take on each film.

item.title: Interesting little browser feature
item.description: Ever wanted to edit any page in place. Well you always could apparently. Simply enter the following in IE or Firefox and you can edit content in place. Handy for mocking up web pages. javascript:document.body.contentEditable='true'; document.designMode='on'; void 0
